paragraphs: We are a small, fast-moving team of passionate developers ready to put in odd hours to ship faster.
Many companies rely on Excel — we help automate the relationships between sheets and systems.
We leverage AI tools to build high-quality products quickly while keeping humans in control.
Our differentiator: the simplest projects delivered within 24 hours.
